name: Genetics Simulator
description:
A unique way to visualize how different genes can affect appearance.

Each vegetable has two genes that can be combined together into a total of 21 possible combinations, see if you can make them all!

Controls:

Use the left mouse button to click on a vegetable to select it!

  • +   Creates offspring when two parents are selected.
  • -   Deletes selected vegetables.
  • X   Closes the window.
  • ?   Opens the help menu
  • ⟳   Resets the level.

Known Bugs:

  • Minor selection glitches when too many vegetables are spawned in too quickly.
  • Problems keeping track of selected vegetables when two with the exact same genes are selected and deselected.

Credits:

  • Aleece Harmon - Art and programming
  • Font by Denise Bentulan (c)2011

Created in Unreal!
